content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Describe one historical development illustrated by the passage. b) Describe Luther’s argument regarding war with the Turks. c) Describe Luther’s purpose in making this argument.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
